audios.au: Zu raise the load platform using the remote-control unit, in the case of semitrailers all axles are preselected using the preselect button rear axle.
As long as the RAISE button is pressed, all supporting bellows - if the lifting axle is lowered - are pressurized and the superstructure is raised.
The continuous lighting of the ECAS signal lamp indicates, that the current driving level has been left.
As long as the LOWER button is pressed, all supporting bellows are vented and the superstructure is lowered.
The superstructure returns to driving level at a push on the driving level button.
The ECAS signal lamp is switched off, as soon as the driving level has been reached again.
